name: Escape! From the Graveyard
description:
This is our first Jam and our very first game. A game is about a lost ghost trying to escape DEATH in the world of Halloween nightmares. To beat the game you need to avoid monsters and solve several puzzles! Good luck.

Programmed by: alekcm
Artist: Emo_4el
Music: alessandra

P.S. The last level was not completed due to time constraints. We apologise(
P.S.S. Remember, if you find a bug, then this is a feature.

Not our parts: The project used Astar Pathfinding.
